txt.en: 'Aye, do you fish? I come to these docks every day. I fish all along the coast. You want to know the secret to a relaxing life? Well, I will tell you. You sit on the dock over there and you catch some silvery pout. Aye, reeling in a pout is not too hard, but just enough challenge to matter. It is a fine feeling.'
'Well, will you look at that? Caught a bunch of pout, did you? Quite the fisher you turned out to be. Aye, you caught more than I have ever caught in a day, I will tell you that!'
Haldil, a local at the Cape Docks, enjoys each day by fishing.
Haldil is down by the Cape Docks.\n\nYou should speak to Haldil when you have a moment.
Fish can be caught down at the Cape Docks.\n\nYou should catch some fish at your leisure.
